WorkItem.Description:
When generating a MySql script, I copy and paste into my MySql promt, but it errors out when:

1.  The second line above each table definition (the comment line '-----------------------------...' does not get recognized as a comment, because comments must start with '--' followed by a space.

2. The table definitions do not get applied in the prompt because the last line does not end with a semicolon:
")
ENGINE=INNODB"

 Should be:
")
ENGINE=INNODB;"

If you can make these fixes, it would be much appreciated!

Thanks,
Ryan
WorkItem.Summary: Two bugs in DB Diagram Tool
